name: NOVA CORE CHAOS
description:
NOVA CORE CHAOS is a chaotic co-op cooking game for one to five players. You and your fellow robot friends need to work as a team to prep and fill energy cores with their designated elements to help customers evolve into the Novas they want to be! But be fast, these customers don't like waiting too long!

CUSTOMERS NEED CORES, YOU NEED TO CRAFT!
Robots will come flooding in, asking for a energy core, so they too can have awesome powers just like you. It's your job to grab the empty energy cores, refine their shape and fill them with the correct energy sources. If you give a customer the wrong Nova-core, they'll end up angry! Make too many customers angry and you'll lose the game! So stay focused while making your energy cores. There's a total of 20 different combinations for you to make!



5 UNIQUE NOVAS, 5 UNIQUE PLAYSTYLES
Every playable Nova has their own unique ability to help make the energy cores. Use these to speed up the workflow! Each Nova can only be picked once, but every Nova can help out with every task!



UP TO 5 PLAYERS
Work alone or together with up to 5 friends to help the customers evolve into a Nova! Just invite a friend from you friends list and start making energy cores!
